definition: to navigate towards a specific destination or target, often used in the context of steering a ship or controlling the direction of a vehicle or aircraft
examples: We need to navigate towards the goal.
Der Pilot steuert das Flugzeug an.
Das Schiff steuert den Hafen an.
The ship is heading towards the harbor.
Er steuert das Unternehmen in die richtige Richtung.
He steers the company in the right direction.
They are driving the project forward.
Der Kapitän steuert das Schiff sicher an.
The captain navigates the ship safely.
We need to address the problem.
Das Auto steuert auf die Ampel zu.
The car is heading towards the traffic light.
Er steuert den Ball ins Tor.
He steers the ball into the goal.
